properties.copyright: Public Domain, Administered by CCLI Administration Account

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've been redeemed by the blood of the Lamb.
I've been redeemed by the blood of the Lamb.
I've been redeemed by the blood of the Lamb.
Filled with the Holy Ghost, I am.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And that's not all
there's more besides. (3x)
I've been to the river and I've been baptized.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No, you can't get to heaven by your good deeds. (3x)
To God they're just like garden weeds.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's not much time
left for us here. (3x)
For Jesus' comin' is drawing near.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I've been redeemed
by the Lord above. (3x)
He paid the price with His precious blood.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You can talk about me
just as much as you please. (3x)
I'll talk about you down on my knees.
All my sins are washed away.
I've been redeemed.
